143d8407-b3fa-4806-93f1-5ddcd516a668.name: 幸运
143d8407-b3fa-4806-93f1-5ddcd516a668.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

da793a5e-6ed9-4224-be31-5166a0e31c7e.name: 战斗反射
da793a5e-6ed9-4224-be31-5166a0e31c7e.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

d67fd86a-6315-4769-baa2-84fb094343c9.name: Luck, Extraordinary
d67fd86a-6315-4769-baa2-84fb094343c9.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

51203aba-6041-4f9f-a6ff-cec80dd9fda0.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

64e205e0-b7ff-4da5-ab3f-d27c6acb464e.name: 标志性装备
64e205e0-b7ff-4da5-ab3f-d27c6acb464e.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

cf62a43d-ee90-4995-bff7-c7babd7c2862.name: Reaction Bonus
cf62a43d-ee90-4995-bff7-c7babd7c2862.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

9543e733-1deb-4748-97b0-d5cc39cceaca.name: 可选增益
9543e733-1deb-4748-97b0-d5cc39cceaca.notes: 在抵抗天赋对应的技能上获得加值

591f41a4-abe8-443d-a85e-36450397d124.name: 期待陪伴
591f41a4-abe8-443d-a85e-36450397d124.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

91270e27-4618-4a66-8844-e7503381210a.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
91270e27-4618-4a66-8844-e7503381210a.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

45b2da4f-83ab-4c30-bbfb-4f2dd9bc3774.name: A further 8 points distributed among combat skills above

af0f423c-d8fb-4bf4-bdf6-95b9722911de.name: Or 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level

7cd5d5a6-207b-42ef-b3d6-4e5d3f113312.name: Or 1 point to buy another secondary skill at one level lower
